A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic special effects and many parts of the movie were great....however\, has the director seen episodes 4-6?! They understand the character development that Luke already went through? Have they seen the movies?! Because Luke Skywalker\, the hero of the trilogy\, was still an immature\, scared\, and un-jedi like character as can be imagined.  Great job ruining his legacy.
